text.p: These are the leading stories in the Moroccan press on Friday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Prime Minister Abdellatif Filali tells parliament government follows rational policy to handle privatisation programme launched in 1993.
- Oil giant Royal Dutch Shell expected to carry out feasibility study to extract oil from Morocco's bituminous shales.
- State-owned airline Royal Air Maroc rewards best local travel agencies.
- Study says Morocco's population expected to go beyond 45 million by the year 2060.
- The government to take over loss-making private channel 2M on Jan 11.
